```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r library}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r data reading}
ces <- read.csv(here("data", "ces3demographics.csv")) %>%
  clean_names()

```

```{r}
#Scatterplot graph

ggplot(data=ces,aes(x=white, y=ces_3_0_score))+
  geom_hex() +
  labs(x = "% White Population",
       y = "CES 3.0 Score")+
  scale_fill_gradient(low="darkorchid4", high="magenta")+
  theme_minimal()
```
